project_descr: This project will contribute to a peaceful and secure environment during the 2018 election process in Sierra Leone through conflict prevention initiatives.

outputs.output_descr: This project seeks to strengthen national and local efforts to ensure dialogue and mediation on community and household disputes between individuals and communities, and multinationals.
This project seeks to strengthen national and local efforts for to identify and mitigate tensions and threats of potential conflict during the electoral cycle.
donor_name: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and development - Canada

outputs.output_descr: The project seeks to contribute to ongoing efforts by Civil Society Organizations and the International Community by supporting the creation of an enabling environment for Sierra Leoneans to participate in the March 2018 elections as voters, candidates, elections staff etc. and ensuring that the peace and security of not just the country but the Mano River Union and ECOWAS remain peaceful and secured.
